listing.description: Stunning home with 3 full finished levels of 4230 sq feet. Extensive windows, expansive views, huge eat inkit with island, serving bar and more. Large formal dining room, super master bedroom suite, 3 full plus 2 half baths, inground pool, deck, patio, covered front porch. Beautiful home in top location.

listing.title: 34505 Dogwood Lane, Alta, CA
listing.amenities: Basement, Dining room, Dishwasher, Laundry area - inside, Walk-in closet, Stove/Oven, Balcony, Deck, or Patio, Tile floor, Yard, Granite countertop, Living room, Stainless steel appliances, Bonus/Rec room
listing.description: EXCEPTIONAL 2800+ SF HOME ON 2.5 ACRES LOCATED IN THE QUAINT MOUNTAIN COMMUNITY OF ALTA. Designed to be low maintenance and energy efficient, this home will save time and money. Perfect for retirement living or the home business professional. The 3 bedroom, 3 full bathroom home is situated on a heavily treed parcel with fragrant dogwood, oak, pine, fir and cedar. Beautiful low maintenance gardens with mature azalea, rhododendrons, perennials and winding paved paths surround the front of the home. The striking interior double leaded glass doors lead to a open floor plan, with living room, dining room, kitchen, guest room/office and master suite all on the main level. A family room loft with rustic wood vaulted ceilings and a cozy woodstove, a lower level private third bedroom and a laundry room complete the floor plan. The kitchen has recently been remodeled with beautiful granite countertops, a travertine backsplash and top of the line stainless steel appliances. It also has plentiful storage cabinets and a walk in pantry. The dining and living rooms are large and perfect for family gatherings. The master bedroom feels like a luxury hotel suite due to its large size and spa like bathroom. A comfy sitting area with fireplace will keep you warm. Double French doors lead to the private rear deck with serene forest views. Energy efficient features include individually controlled zoned heating in each room, quality Hunter ceiling fans throughout, dual paned windows, energy efficient appliances, on demand water heating system, and two Mendota fireplaces. A huge basement area can be used for storage or workspace. The oversized 2 car garage can double as a workshop as it is equipped with 220 electrical and compressed airlines. The home has high-speed internet and satellite TV access. Low maintenance features include porcelain tile, laminate flooring, powder coated deck railings and entry gate, natural landscaping with automatic sprinklers, fiberglass exterior doors, Trex-type decking, metal roofing and city water with all new lines to main. The exterior also has a garden shed, raised garden beds, an indoor/outdoor dog run, and wildlife feeding areas, so that you can enjoy the outdoors. A large level area is fenced and paved for privacy, with plenty of parking. Perimeter lighting highlights the beautiful property in the evening. This lovingly cared for home is ready to enjoy all the benefits of mountain living. Must see to appreciate the quality!

listing.description:
This gorgeous 3821 sf master down home features 5 spacious bedrooms, 3.5 baths, both formal rooms and a giant bonus room. It's dramatic 2 story foyer overlooks front entrance. Crown molding, picture molding and chair railing in formal dining room. Beautiful hardwoods throughout the foyer, hall, powder room, kitchen and breakfast nook. Granite counter tops in kitchen and all 3 full baths. Open kitchen overlooks breakfast nook and family room. Huge laundry room on 1st floor. Fireplace with granite surround in family room. Covered front porch to enjoy. Home sits on a 1/3 of an acre cul-de-sac lot. This home is in the desirable Kingsbridge subdivision. The community features a swimming pool, tot pool, cabana, changing rooms and bathrooms, wooded common area, sidewalks and old fashion street lamp posts throughout neighborhood.
The Kingsbridge community is in an absolute great location! It is close to I-77 and I-485 exchange for an easy commute to surrounding towns. It is just minutes away from shopping, dining and entertainment. Equal Housing opportunity.
